sentences.en: A pigeon probably has his Huff Duff in that incrustation above his beak.
sentences.cn: 鸽子也有它的无线电高频测向仪,也许就是它喙上部的那个硬包吧.

sentences.en: After the row in a pub he drove off in a huff.
sentences.cn: 在酒吧里吵了一架后，他气鼓鼓地开车走了。

sentences.en: Chueh - min walked out as if in a great huff.
sentences.cn: 觉民笑了笑,就往前走了.

sentences.en: He left the room in a huff.
sentences.cn: 他怒冲冲地离开了房间.

sentences.en: He went off in a huff when she criticized his work.
sentences.cn: 当她批评他的工作时,他怒气冲冲地走掉了.

sentences.en: He's gone back to London in a huff and good riddance.
sentences.cn: 他已经怒气冲冲地回伦敦了，总算把他打发走了。

sentences.en: How can you expect him to listen to me, when he's still in a huff with me?
sentences.cn: 他跟我别着劲哪!能听我的 吗 ?

sentences.en: I'll huff and I'll puff and I'll blow your house down.
sentences.cn: 我又是吹气又是喷气,要把你的房子掀翻.

sentences.en: In a huff, Jerusha threw the letter in the mailbox.
sentences.cn: 洁茹气呼呼地把信丢进邮筒.

sentences.en: Putin will most likely be left to huff and puff alone.
sentences.cn: 普京极有可能独自气恼.

sentences.en: She bounced out of the room in a huff.
sentences.cn: 她怒气冲冲地冲出房间.

sentences.en: She flounced out of my room in a huff.
sentences.cn: 她愤愤地冲出我的房间。

sentences.en: She went out of the room in a huff.
sentences.cn: 她怒冲冲地走出了房间.

sentences.en: What's the use of flying into a huff at home?
sentences.cn: 在家跳蹋会子也不中用.

sentences.en: When Chao Hsin - mei saw Miss Su detain Fang Hung - chien , he left in a huff.
sentences.cn: 赵辛楣 看苏小姐留住方鸿 渐, 奋然而出.

words.tran_cn: 发怒的；傲慢的；不高兴的

trans.tran_cn: 喷，吹，叫嚣，虚张声势，恼怒的反应，生气
使膨胀，使充气，蛮横地对待，欺侮，恼怒，烦恼
